channel.title: Project Development v1
channel.description:
Hey, welcome to project development thread, this is based of final devolution 2.5, its old name was int [] tomsProject; but i changed it to stop faggots asking about the name.
THIS IS LIKE 54% DONE
features: (main)
[ul][li]working stairs in most places, including craft guild they work going up and down.[/li][li]put Java annotations around things in server.java to stop it spamming the box when you mass ( because i ahvent added timers yet)[/li][li]added npcs i areas like rs[/li][li]all stalls at ardouge work[/li][li]working woodcutting, no levels thought, it adds xp + correct animation[/li][li]smithing (really basic )[/li][li]mining ( really basic)[/li][li]added craft guild[/li][li]mining at craft guild[/li][li]NPCS teleport you to places.[/li][li]3 stalls at home[/li][li]moved home to draynor[/li][li]correct animations for almost everything[/li][li]Java annotations so you can read and find things easier.[/li][li]new training areas[/li][li]only 4 shops for econmy, shops dont have like 500k of one item.[/li][li]added LOTS more drops[/li][li]added Lumbridge guide at lumby and draynor, he has has NPC dialougue[/li][li]improved the starter a bit, by like 5k lol.[/li][li]Teleports now lead to diffrent places[/li][li]removed the requirement for runes to teleport.[/li][li]added spread out shops, in places like Varrock, Al Kharid ect..[/li][li]Npc pickpocketing[/li][li]small size[/li][li]All Npcs move.[/li][li]ALL shops are econmy based[/li][/ul]
and lots more..
NOW FOR THE DOWNSIDE.
because its not complete i havent added timers, but its not rocket science so go ahead.
base: final devolution 2.5 size: 0.54MB thanks to killaimes (sorry if i got that wrong)
pictures, my clicks are broken so when i go to crop a picture it goes all white, so ile just show you the ones from myy development thread ages ago, ile try and get some more pics soon, sorry:
[img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/THISONE2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/THISONE1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/THISONE3.jpg[/img]
there some pics of it a while back, ile try and get some up to date ones. and anyway its oly 0.54mb just download and see.
THERE IS ALSO A SIMPLE ANTI LEACH!
its like the easiest that exists..
--- - thanks, ile get a mate to upload some.
credits:
Me killaimes (sorry if i got name wrong) Rog3r
DOWNLOAD:
[url=http://uppit.com/v/PVJJFDR4]http://uppit.com/v/PVJJFDR4[/url]

item.title: Project Development v1
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

_ikram:

Why would you release such a basic dev2.6 source with an anti-leech? when we can donwload the originall 2.6 by killamess and it would be the exact same.

Its actually not as basic now, this was like really old one. But i suppose your point still stands.

And how would it be exactly the same? Can you not read.

Read full topic
